description: Use this resource to create and manage synthetics alert conditions in New Relic.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Enabled.description: Set whether to enable the alert condition. Defaults to `true`.

MonitorId.description:
The ID of the Synthetics monitor to be referenced in the alert condition.
* `runbook_url` - (Optional) Runbook URL to display in notifications.
* `enabled` - (Optional) Set whether to enable the alert condition. Defaults to `true`.

Name.description:
The title of this condition.
* `monitor_id` - (Required) The ID of the Synthetics monitor to be referenced in the alert condition.
* `runbook_url` - (Optional) Runbook URL to display in notifications.
* `enabled` - (Optional) Set whether to enable the alert condition. Defaults to `true`.

PolicyId.description:
The ID of the policy where this condition should be used.
* `name` - (Required) The title of this condition.
* `monitor_id` - (Required) The ID of the Synthetics monitor to be referenced in the alert condition.
* `runbook_url` - (Optional) Runbook URL to display in notifications.
* `enabled` - (Optional) Set whether to enable the alert condition. Defaults to `true`.

RunbookUrl.description:
Runbook URL to display in notifications.
* `enabled` - (Optional) Set whether to enable the alert condition. Defaults to `true`.
